code: var axios=require('axios');var getTopics=function getTopics(){return axios.get('https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/topics').then(function(_ref){var topics=_ref.data.topics;return topics;});};var getSingleArticle=function getSingleArticle(id){return axios.get("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(id)).then(function(_ref2){var article=_ref2.data.article;return article;});};var getArticleComments=function getArticleComments(id){return axios.get("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(id,"/comments")).then(function(_ref3){var comments=_ref3.data.comments;return comments;});};var getSortedArticles=function getSortedArticles(specifiedTopic,selector){return axios.get("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/articles",{params:{topic:specifiedTopic,sort_by:selector}}).then(function(_ref4){var articles=_ref4.data.articles;return articles;});};var postComment=function postComment(comment,user,id){return axios.post("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/articles/".concat(id,"/comments"),{username:user,body:comment});};var deleteComment=function deleteComment(id){return axios.delete("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/comments/".concat(id));};var vertasilePatch=function vertasilePatch(increment,id,type){console.log(increment,id,type);return axios.patch("https://roanncnewsserver.herokuapp.com/api/".concat(type,"/").concat(id),{inc_votes:increment});};module.exports={getTopics:getTopics,getSingleArticle:getSingleArticle,getArticleComments:getArticleComments,getSortedArticles:getSortedArticles,postComment:postComment,deleteComment:deleteComment,vertasilePatch:vertasilePatch};
